name: AC PAC-Script Generator
descripton: Generates PAC-script based on dump.csv from zapret-info/z-i repo.

GH_REPO.description: Repo to which generated PAC-script will be uploaded. Example: anticensority/generated-pac-scripts.

GH_TOKEN.description: OAuth token that gives write access to GH_REPO (scope 'repo'). It may be generated by GitHub if you provide client id and secret, try following https://github.com/lelylan/simple-oauth2/blob/master/example/index.js
